front.title: Procedure to Select and Confirm Individuals Serving on the IAB and IESG

abstract.t: This draft reflects one person's recollection as to a rough consensus reached in December, 1992 with respect to the selection and confirmation of individuals serving on the IAB and IESG. The author has taken great care to record only those aspects of the process which were clearly discussed. Reviewers of this draft are encouraged to take similar care. Once there is broad agreement on this recollection, then this draft will be used as a contribution to the working group responsible for fine-tuning the selection and confirmation process.
